description:
Ishikawa bakes a pound cake for an assignment in class. Otori and Ishikawa go to the mall to eat udon.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuuketsuki-chan to Chouri Jisshuu / Kyuuketsuki-chan to Odekake
Li`l Miss Vampire and Cooking Class / Li`l Miss Vampire`s Day Out
吸血鬼ちゃんと調理実習 / 吸血鬼ちゃんとおでかけ
